tool_description: Ukraine Russia War News API brings you the latest news about the war and how far states have joined hands in order to stop the war from the World's renowned News sources.
name: Ukraine Russia War News
title: Ukraine Russia War News

api_list.name: Get News from a specific source
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get news about the war from a specific source defined by the API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-russia-war-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/NYdailynews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-russia-war-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-russia-war-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-russia-war-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News
api_list.description: Get the latest news from all the sources this API can fetch for you.
